org.netbeans.spi.editor.document

Interface OnSaveTask

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cancellable

    public interface OnSaveTask
extends Cancellable
    Task done right before document is saved. Factories need to be registered in MimeLookup.
    Since:
    1.66

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  OnSaveTask.Context
      Context given to factory for production of on-save task.
      static interface  OnSaveTask.Factory
      Factory for creation of on-save task.
      static class  OnSaveTask.PackageAccessor 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean cancel()
      Cancel processing of the job.
      void performTask()
      Perform the task on the context (given to factory that produced this task).
      void runLocked(Runnable run)
      Perform the given runnable under a lock specific for this task.

    • Method Detail

      • performTask

        void performTask()
        Perform the task on the context (given to factory that produced this task).

      • runLocked

        void runLocked(@NonNull
               Runnable run)
        Perform the given runnable under a lock specific for this task. The runnable will include a call to performTask() but it may also call other tasks if there are multiple ones.
        For multiple task factories registered their runLocked(java.lang.Runnable) methods will be called subsequently (according to their registration order) in a nested way.
        Parameters:
        run - non-null runnable provided by the infrastructure.

      • cancel

        boolean cancel()
        Cancel processing of the job. Called not more than once for specific job.
        Specified by:
        cancel in interface Cancellable
        Returns:
        true if the job was successfully canceled, false if job can't be canceled for some reason.
        See Also:
        Cancellable
